places.name: Serengeti National Park - Safari Experience
places.description: Witness the Great Migration, where millions of wildebeest and zebras migrate across the vast plains. Spot lions, cheetahs, and other wildlife in their natural habitat.

places.name: Mount Kilimanjaro - Climbing Adventure
places.description: Climb Africa’s tallest mountain and enjoy breathtaking views from the summit. A challenging yet rewarding experience for adventurers.

places.name: Zanzibar - Beach Relaxation & Culture
places.description: Relax on pristine white sand beaches, explore Stone Town’s rich history, and experience spice tours on this tropical island.

places.name: Ngorongoro Crater - Wildlife Viewing
places.description: A UNESCO site with a high density of wildlife, including the endangered black rhino. Perfect for a one-day safari experience.

places.name: Tarangire National Park - Elephant Paradise
places.description: Famous for its large elephant herds and scenic baobab trees, this park is a great place to see diverse wildlife and birds.

places.name: Mafia Island - Snorkeling & Diving
places.description: A paradise for scuba divers and snorkelers, known for its vibrant coral reefs and whale shark sightings.

places.name: Dar es Salaam - Cultural & City Life
places.description: Tanzania’s largest city, filled with markets, historical sites, museums, and a lively waterfront.

places.name: Gombe Stream National Park - Chimpanzee Trekking
places.description: A remote park made famous by Jane Goodall, where you can trek through forests and observe wild chimpanzees up close.
